title: Danny Blanchflower on BOE: Big Mistake to Not Cut Rates (Audio)
itunes:title: Danny Blanchflower on BOE: Big Mistake to Not Cut Rates (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Leading labour economist Danny Blanchflower, Professor of Economics at Dartmouth College and Bloomberg Television Contributing editor, on the Bank of England's rate decision and the new UK leadership.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
